attributes.action: close down the crocodile farm in cambridge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the owner said he had imported eight Nile crocodiles, each around eight feet long, and planned to breed them for meat.
Nile Crocodiles are endangered species!

No one should be allowed to keep them, kill them and sell the meat.

Please help to protect these fantastic endangered reptiles that are one of the closest creatures to dinosaurs alive on the planet today. 

Thier worst enemies are already humans, that kill them for thier skin.

Please help to save them.
